last_episode_to_air.name: Genius Knows No Boundaries
last_episode_to_air.overview: Five new contestants demonstrate their extraordinary talents on the SUPERHUMAN stage. With the $50,000 grand prize on the line, another tough decision must be made.

name: Superhuman
overview: Contestants who possess a distinct, nearly super-human ability in fields such as memory, hearing, taste, touch, smell, sight and more are challenged to push their extraordinary skills to win a $50,000 grand prize.

episodes.name: Beyond the Imagination
episodes.overview: Five contestants will put their incredible talents - ranging from synesthesic, stereoscopic, memory and frog call skills - to the ultimate test, as they compete for the grand prize of $50,000 dollars. Host Kal Penn, along with celebrity panelists Mike Tyson, Christina Milian and Dr. Rahul Jandial, have a tough decision, as they must help to decide who wins it all.

episodes.name: More Than Meets the Mind
episodes.overview: Five new contestants show off their outrageous talents - from master memorizers to mathematicians - the panelists and audience are left stunned. With the $50,000 grand prize on the line, another tough decision must be made.

episodes.name: Believe the Unbelievable
episodes.overview: Five new contestants demonstrate their insane talents on the SUPERHUMAN stage and the judges and audience are left speechless after seeing what could be the best challenge yet. Skills range rom photographic memory, to recognizing bird calls and translating backwards language.

episodes.name: Extreme Awareness
episodes.overview: Five seemingly ordinary people compete in incredibly difficult mind and body challenges, hoping to impress the celebrity panelists and audience. Each contestant showcases his/her special talent, with one challenge involving famed magicians Penn & Teller. However, only one will win the grand prize of $50,000.

episodes.name: All Parts Extraordinary
episodes.overview: $50,000 dollars and the title of "SUPERHUMAN" is on the line, as five new contestants showcase their incredible skills. From memorization to speed counting and facial recognition, the panelists and audience are left stunned, challenge after challenge.

episodes.name: No Task Too Tall
episodes.overview: Five new contestants demonstrate their extraordinary talents on the SUPERHUMAN stage. From a contestant who can memorize every detail of a set of keys used to unlock various doors to another who remembers the ice cream order of more than thirty students, the panelists are blown away by their talents. But when one contestant fails to complete a challenge, the studio audience struggles to determine who will win the grand prize of $50,000 dollars.

episodes.name: Powers of Deduction
episodes.overview: Five new contestants demonstrate their extraordinary talents on the SUPERHUMAN stage. With the $50,000 grand prize on the line, another tough decision must be made.

episodes.name: Genius Knows No Boundaries
episodes.overview: Five new contestants demonstrate their extraordinary talents on the SUPERHUMAN stage. With the $50,000 grand prize on the line, another tough decision must be made.
